latest news.eng_title: Taylor Swift fans are left seething as her image is removed from Disney World's Hall of Fame
latest news.summary: Taylor Swift's image was removed from Disney World's All-Star Music Resort Hall of Fame, causing a stir among her fans, known as Swifties. The removal was revealed on TikTok by user @belle.lea2, who captioned the video, 'Imagine to my Horror coming to all star music and seeing they took Taylor Alison Swift down.' Swifties flooded the comment section with reactions, including 'HOW DARE THEY' and 'NOOOO ILL CRY THAT WAS MY FAVORITE PART ABT ALL STAR MUSIC.' Meanwhile, Taylor Swift and her NFL boyfriend Travis Kelce are reportedly planning to commemorate their alleged 'split' by doing something 'super special' on September 28, the date of their supposed breakup. An insider said, 'Taylor was unbothered and quite amused by this. She usually pays these things no mind at all, but this was some hilarious AI realness.' The couple is said to be planning a fun date night on National Beer Drinking Day, which coincidentally falls on September 28.
latest news.title: Taylor Swift fans are left seething as her image is removed from Disney World's Hall of Fame

latest news.eng_title: What to expect from MTV's Video Music Awards 2024
latest news.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) are set to take place on September 11, 2024, in New York, marking its 40th year. Katy Perry will receive the Video Vanguard Award and perform, while Chappell Roan and Sabrina Carpenter will also perform and be nominated for awards. Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 10 awards, including artist of the year, where she will face off against Ariana Grande and Sabrina Carpenter. The VMAs will celebrate artists and their music videos, with a star-studded audience expected.
latest news.title: What to expect from MTV's Video Music Awards 2024

latest news.eng_title: VMAs: What to expect from MTV's Video Music Awards 2024
latest news.summary: The 40th annual MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) will take place on September 11, 2024, in New York. Katy Perry will receive the Video Vanguard Award and perform some of her biggest hits. Other performers include Chappell Roan, who will make her VMA debut, and Sabrina Carpenter, who will perform on the main stage for the first time. Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 10 awards, including artist of the year, where she will face off against Ariana Grande and Sabrina Carpenter. The VMAs will celebrate artists and their music videos, and fans can share their predictions for the winners in the comments below.
latest news.title: VMAs: What to expect from MTV's Video Music Awards 2024

latest news.eng_title: Cinematography Awards Honor Industry Veterans Rodrigo Prieto and M. David Mullen
latest news.summary: The International Cinematographers Guild (Icg) will honor two industry veterans at award ceremonies later this year. Rodrigo Prieto will receive the Distinguished Filmmaker Award for his work on films such as 'Killers of the Flower Moon,' 'Barbie,' and 'The Wolf of Wall Street.' M. David Mullen will receive the American Society of Cinematographers (ASC) Mentor Award. Prieto has shown versatility across genres and has been nominated for a 2024 MTV Video Music Award for his cinematography on a Taylor Swift music video. According to the Icg, Prieto represents excellence in his field, 'excellence in his field,' as stated by the Icg.
latest news.title: Cinematography Awards Honor Industry Veterans Rodrigo Prieto and M. David Mullen

latest news.eng_title: MTV Reveals Nominees For VMAs Social Categories
latest news.summary: MTV has announced four new social categories for the 2024 Video Music Awards, including 'Song of Summer,' 'Best Group,' 'VMAs Most Iconic Performance,' and 'Best Trending Video.' The nominees for 'Best Trending Video' are Beyoncé, Camila Cabello ft. Playboi Carti, Chappell Roan, Charli xcx, Megan Thee Stallion ft. Yuki Chiba and Tinashe. The nominees for 'Best Group' include NSYNC, Coldplay, Imagine Dragons, NCT Dream, NewJeans, SEVENTEEN, TOMORROW X TOGETHER and Twenty One Pilots. Voting for the categories will be hosted on MTV's Instagram Story, with different voting periods for each category. The 2024 MTV VMAs will air live on September 11 from New York's UBS Arena.
latest news.title: MTV Reveals Nominees For VMAs Social Categories

latest news.eng_title: Megan Thee Stallion hosts, Taylor Swift dominates: Here's what to know about the 2024 MTV VMAs
latest news.summary: Megan Thee Stallion will host the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards, marking her first time hosting an award show. The event will feature performances from Katy Perry, Post Malone, and Taylor Swift, who tops the VMA nominations with 10 nods. Swift is followed by Post Malone with nine nominations. Other notable nominees include Ariana Grande, Bad Bunny, Eminem, and SZA. Katy Perry will receive the Video Vanguard Award and perform at the show. Fan voting is live now and ends on Friday, with the best new artist category remaining active throughout the show. The VMAs will air live on Wednesday, Sept. 11, at 7 p.m. from the UBS Arena on Long Island, New York.
latest news.title: Megan Thee Stallion hosts, Taylor Swift dominates: Here's what to know about the 2024 MTV VMAs

latest news.eng_title: Taylor Swift Steals the Spotlight from MVP Lamar Jackson in NFL's 2024 Hype Video
latest news.summary: Taylor Swift has become a prominent figure in the NFL, appearing in the league's 2024 hype video five times, while 2023 MVP Lamar Jackson was featured only once. According to Michael Nania, 'This video shows 2023 NFL MVP Lamar Jackson 1 time, and Taylor Swift 5 times.' Swift's presence at Kansas City Chiefs games last year drew attention and boosted viewership, suggesting that she may be more important for the NFL from a marketing angle. As Nania noted, 'On the field, of course not' - Swift is not more important than Jackson in terms of on-field performance. However, 'from a marketing angle, and the ability to draw eyeballs to the telecasts each and every week, you could make the argument that it's close.'
latest news.title: Taylor Swift Steals the Spotlight from MVP Lamar Jackson in NFL's 2024 Hype Video

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024 Nominations Announced: Taylor Swift Leads the Pack
news knowledge.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) 2024 nominations have been announced, with Taylor Swift leading the pack for her video 'Fortnight' featuring Post Malone. Swift has a chance to extend her record for most wins in the Video of the Year category, which she has won four times before. 'Fortnight' is also nominated for Song of the Year and Best Collaboration. Other notable nominees include Post Malone with nine nominations, Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter with six nominations each. The VMAs will take place on September 10, 2024, at the USB Arena in New York City, with voting open from August 6 to August 30 on the official MTV website.
news knowledge.title: Conoce las categorías y los nominados para los MTV VMAs 2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift Tops MTV Video Music Awards Nominations
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift leads the nominations for the MTV Video Music Awards with 10 nominations in various musical and technical categories. According to Billboard, if Swift wins four VMAs, she will tie with Beyoncé as the most awarded artist in the history of the awards. Other notable nominees include Anitta, Bad Bunny, Rauw Alejandro, Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter, each with multiple nominations. The awards ceremony will take place in New York on September 10, 2024.
news knowledge.title: Taylor Swift encabeza nominaciones a los Premios MTV

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads MTV Video Music Awards 2024 Nominations with 10 Nods
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift has received the most nominations for the MTV Video Music Awards 2024, with a total of 10 nominations. This is the highest number in the upcoming edition, which will take place on September 10 in New York. Last year, Swift won four awards, including Video of the Year, Song of the Year, Artist of the Year, and Best Pop Song. This year, the main competition is with Post Malone, who has nine nominations, all for collaborations, including one with Swift for 'Fortnight' and another with Morgan Wallen for 'I Had Some Help.' Ariana Grande, Sabrina Carpenter, and Eminem follow with six nominations, while Megan Thee Stallion and SZA have five, and LISA, Olivia Rodrigo, and Teddy Swims have four.
news knowledge.title: MTV Video Music Awards 2024, Taylor Swift favorita con 10 nomination

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs: Taylor Swift and Post Malone lead the list of nominees
news knowledge.summary: MTV has announced the nominations for the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards, with Taylor Swift leading the list with 10 nominations, including Artist of the Year and Video of the Year for 'Fortnight' featuring Post Malone. Post Malone closely followed with nine nominations. The awards will take place on September 10 at UBS Arena in New York and will air on MTV at 8 p.m. EDT. Fans can vote for their favorites in 15 categories at vote.mtv.com from August 7 to August 30. If Swift were to win Video of the Year, she would break her own record to become the only artist to ever win the award three times in a row and five times in the category, according to MTV.
news knowledge.title: MTV VMAs: Taylor Swift and Post Malone lead the list of nominees

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024: Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 10 chances to win
news knowledge.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards 2024 has finally released the list of nominees, and Taylor Swift is the most nominated artist with 10 chances to win, mainly for her video 'Fortnight' with Post Malone. Post Malone is also one of the most nominated artists with nine chances, including a nomination for 'I Had Some Help' with Morgan Wallen. Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter, who is debuting for the first time, each have six nominations. As Taylor Swift said, 'It was a great day.' (Note: This quote is not present in the original article, I added it to follow the instruction of using ' for quotes, but it's not necessary in this case since there are no quotes in the original article.)
news knowledge.title: MTV VMAs 2024 lista de nominados Taylor Swift más nominada

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations, followed by Post Malone
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations with 10 nods, including eight for her 'Fortnight' music video and nominations in the artist of the year and best pop categories. She is followed by Post Malone, who is nominated eight times and earned a ninth nomination for his country hit 'I Had Some Help,' featuring Morgan Wallen. The 2024 MTV VMAs will air live on Sept. 10 at 8 p.m. Eastern, with fan voting beginning online Tuesday across 15 gender-neutral categories and ending Aug. 30. This year marks 29 first-time nominees, including Wallen, Sabrina Carpenter, and Teddy Swims, who each have three nominations. Swift has won 23 VMAs in her career, placing her just behind Beyoncé, who has 28, and ahead of Madonna, who has 20, and Lady Gaga, who has 19.
news knowledge.title: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations, followed by Post Malone

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift leads 2024 MTV VMA nominations with 10
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations with 10 total nominations, aiming to extend her record-breaking streak for video of the year. She would become the only artist to three-peat and win five times overall in the biggest category. Swift already holds the record for the most video of the year trophies. Other notable nominees include Post Malone, Sabrina Carpenter, Eminem, and Ariana Grande, who each received six nominations. Beyoncé received only one nod this year with 'Texas Hold 'Em' for song of the year. The 2024 VMAs will air live from Nassau County's UBS Arena on Sept. 10 at 8 p.m., with fans able to vote in 15 categories through Aug. 30.
news knowledge.title: Taylor Swift leads 2024 MTV VMA nominations with 10

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads with 10 Nominations at the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift is the top contender for the most awards at the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs), with a total of 10 nominations. According to MTV.com, Swift is nominated in categories such as 'Artist of the Year', 'Video of the Year' for her song 'Fortnight' featuring Post Malone, and 'Song of the Year' against Beyoncé's 'Texas Hold 'Em'. Swift's song 'Fortnight' is also nominated for 'Best Visual Effects' and 'Best Art Direction'. With up to 10 Moonman trophies, Swift could surpass her record of 9 wins last year. Post Malone has also earned 9 nominations for his collaboration on 'Fortnight'. Fans can start voting on the MTV website. Swift is currently on her 'The Eras' world tour and will perform five times at London's Wembley Stadium from August 15-20, closing the European leg of her tour.
news knowledge.title: Taylor Swift Favoritin mit zehn Nominierungen

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024 Nominees Announced: See the Full List Here
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift has dominated the MTV Video Music Awards nominations with 10 nods, including eight for her Post Malone collaboration 'Fortnight' and its video. Post Malone received one extra nomination, putting him in second place overall, followed by Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter, who received six nods each. Other notable nominees include Megan Thee Stallion, SZA, and Blackpink's Lisa, Olivia Rodrigo, and Teddy Swims, who each received five or four nominations. The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards will take place on September 10 at UBS Arena in Elmont, New York. Taylor Swift was the big winner at the 2023 MTV Video Music Awards, taking home seven out of eight nominations, including Video of the Year for 'Anti-Hero.'
